hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:I did not see the Prophet (ﷺ) reciting (the Qur'an) in the night prayer while sitting except when he became old; when he used to recite while sitting, and when thirty or forty verses remained from the Sura, he would get up and recite them and then bow

chapter.ara-name: باب قِيَامِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بِاللَّيْلِ فِي رَمَضَانَ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Salat (prayer) of the Prophet (ﷺ) at night in Ramadan and (in) other months
